name: Truco Balear by Playspace
description:
Truco Balear by Playspace is a FREE multiplayer card game to enjoy while you are chatting with your friends. The best card online experience is here with Truco Balear by Playspace!

FEATURES Truco Balear by Playspace

- It is free to play!
- Chat and play with your friends.
- Play special games: in pairs, turbo and private
- Compete to be the best player in our Truco Balear Ranking.
- Get double coins when you win your games with the "Double or Nothing"
- Unlock achievements and progress through the game getting gifts and coins

Download the app and enjoy with Truco Balear by Playspace, the best Truco Balear Game!

Follow us on Facebook http://goo.gl/qXIggC and Twitter https://twitter.com/playspace?lang=es to know more about the games of Playspace and contact us.

If you have any problem we will help you solve it.
You can recommend us how we can improve our games https://www.facebook.com/playspace/?ref=ts&fref=ts

Remember, you will need to be connect to play.

Terms and Conditions: http://goo.gl/u30FLZ

Enjoy the best free Truco Balear online in Playspace!

Visit our blog http://blog.playspace.com/

Thank you,
The Playspace Team.
